hero.headline: 5in1 Facial Serum
hero.subheadline: For visibly firmer and radiant skin in just 2 weeks
hero.description: 5in1 facial serum is a non-invasive face lift that gives you a youthful glow and visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles. It tightens & transforms dry, sun-damaged skin into a younger, more even complexion in just a few weeks.

guarantee.tagline: Available online only | While supplies last

testimonial.name: Susan E.
testimonial.quote: "As a 65 year old woman, I have been trying facial products for years now... I mean years... I can't believe I have finally found a product that actually works! How things have changed. Great job doctors!"

items.title: Dry and pale skin
items.description: Niacinamide, collagen peptides, and antioxidants moisturize and nourish your skin.

items.title: Uneven skin tone
items.description: Peptides promote exfoliation and regeneration to reduce hyperpigmentation for a more even tone.

items.title: Fine lines and wrinkles
items.description: Hyaluronic acid mixed with vitamin E & C stimulates collagen and reduces fine lines and wrinkles.

scienceCallout.title: You can feel like yourself again
scienceCallout.body: Doctors uncovered that women who used the serum were able to reverse 60 percent of wrinkles, bumps, and sagging skin in the first month. With continued use for up to three months they reversed more than 95 percent of sagging skin and wrinkles.

ingredients.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
ingredients.subtitle: Results you can see immediately, with confidence that lasts a lifetime.

cards.name: All-In-One Formula
cards.description: This 5-in-1 Facial Serum is formulated with natural ingredients like Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Collagen, offering anti-aging, whitening, moisturizing, and pore-shrinking benefits. Suitable for all skin types, it targets face, neck, hands, and body, providing rejuvenating and firming effects.

ingredients.ctaSupportCopy: Try now with a 90 Day Money-Back Guarantee. All transactions are secured and encrypted.

results.title: Verified customer results
results.intro: Real women share their journeys to smoother, more youthful skin.

stories.name: Barbara E.
stories.quote: It's like I'm putting on make up without putting on make up. I finally feel comfortable in my skin again!

stories.name: Alexandra N.
stories.quote: Product actually works and works great! My husband thinks I got a facelift and loves the new me, really loves!

stories.name: Maria L.
stories.quote: My skin actually changed in front of my eyes, every morning I noticed a difference until I was unnoticeable. No other product has made a difference like this.

stories.name: Claudia O.
stories.quote: I have uploaded my before and after. How is this possible! 3 bottles was all it took... You could see it working right in front of your eyes.

cards.name: Samantha G.
cards.quote: "I have always struggled with skincare products, never helped me. But this new product in just a few weeks changed my skin tone drastically and my make up actually stays on after applying serum."

cards.name: Michelle B.
cards.quote: "Wow is all I could say! Everyone thinks I've gotten Botox or some sort of a surgical procedure. I guess mixing the high active ingredients did the trick."

cards.name: Karen F.
cards.quote: "Okay so I saw this product on TV, of course I didn't believe it worked, but the money back guarantee kind a sucked me in. In 3 days look at my before and after. Amazing product! Thank you thank you thank you! "

productClaims.title: Scientifically proven to
items: Look two decades younger in just a few weeks by reducing wrinkles and fine lines.
Firm and lift sagging skin for a taut, supple appearance.
Use only natural ingredients with no side effects.
Stimulate collagen synthesis for a firmer, more youthful complexion.
Even out skin tone and texture for a flawless look.

steps.label: Step 1
steps.description: Press the dropper and absorb appropriate amount of essence

guarantee.headline: Younger looking skin or you pay nothing!
guarantee.body: Every product is covered by our 90 Day Money Back Guarantee. Try it for 90 days and if you are not completely satisfied, for any reason, send it back and we will refund the full amount of your purchase.

items.question: How long does it take to see results with 5in1 Facial Serum?
items.answer: Clients report noticeable wrinkle reduction in as little as 7 days, with most seeing visible improvements within 2 weeks.

items.question: Is the serum suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin?
items.answer: Yes. Dermatological tests show the serum can be used on sensitive skin.

items.question: How much longer will the sale be on for?
items.answer: The sale ends once we run out of stock. After that it will take 30 days to restock and prices return to full price.

items.question: Where does this fall in my skincare routine?
items.answer: Apply the serum as step two, after cleansing and before moisturizing twice a day.

items.question: What if I am not happy with the results?
items.answer: Contact support@example.com within 90 days of purchase for a full refund. Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

blocks.title: 1. Introduction
blocks.paragraph: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or interact with our products and services.

blocks.title: 2. Information We Collect
blocks.paragraph:
We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when you purchase a product, sign up for our newsletter, or contact our support team. This includes your name, email address, shipping address, and payment details.
We also collect non-personal information automatically through cookies and similar technologies, such as your browser type, device information, and interaction data.

blocks.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
blocks.paragraph:
We use your information to:
- Process and fulfill your orders.
- Provide customer support and respond to inquiries.
- Send promotional communications, product updates, and special offers.
- Improve our website, products, and overall customer experience.
- Comply with legal obligations and enforce our policies.

blocks.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
blocks.paragraph: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our business, such as payment processors, shipping companies, and marketing partners. These parties are contractually obligated to protect your data and only use it for the services they provide to us.

blocks.title: 5. Data Security
blocks.paragraph: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

blocks.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
blocks.paragraph: You can update your personal information or unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time. You may also request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information by contacting us at support@domain.co.

blocks.title: 7. Contact Us
blocks.paragraph: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@domain.co or write to our customer service team at the address listed on your order confirmation.

blocks.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
blocks.paragraph: By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of the site.

blocks.title: 2. Products and Purchases
blocks.paragraph: All purchases are subject to availability and our acceptance. We reserve the right to limit quantities, refuse orders, or update pricing at any time. You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information for all transactions.

blocks.title: 3. Billing and Payment
blocks.paragraph: You authorize us and our third-party payment processors to charge the payment method you provide for all orders placed. You are responsible for any additional taxes, fees, or charges applicable to your purchase.

blocks.title: 4. Shipping and Returns
blocks.paragraph: We process orders within standard timelines and provide tracking information where available. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please refer to our return policy or contact support@domain.co within the guarantee period.

blocks.title: 5. Intellectual Property
blocks.paragraph: All content on this site, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of domain or its licensors and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without express written permission.

blocks.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
blocks.paragraph: To the fullest extent permitted by law, domain is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the site or products.

blocks.title: 7. Changes to These Terms
blocks.paragraph: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. The date at the top of this page reflects the most recent revisions. Continued use of the site after changes means you accept the revised terms.

blocks.title: 8. Contact Us
blocks.paragraph: For questions about these Terms, please contact support@domain.co or use the information provided in your order confirmation.
